titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Ernest W. Sharpe memoir

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.userestrict: Donor reserves literary rights to quotations totalling more than 250 words.

archdesc.bioghist: Manager of Wilson Dairy, Livonia, Mich.
archdesc.scopecontent: Memoir of his experiences as an infantryman in World War II, including D-Day, Battle of the Bulge, liberation of Dachau, and other events.
